job.title: Digital Asset Coordinator
job.description: pstronguDigital Asset Coordinator  VaultustrongppstrongPrimary ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliManage all Digital Assets on our Production servers and Physical TapeDrive Assets in our vaultliliCorrespond with our internal postsupervisors about all incoming and outgoing digital assets drives or tapesliliMake sure all digital and physical assets are received and delivered securely according to our security procedures and policiesliliLog the metadata of all incoming and outgoing digital files into our Digital Asset Management SystemliliKeep accurate and uptodate logs of LTO Tape ArchivesliliSetup redundant or old unneeded assets for recycling or destructionliliMake sure vault is organized and physical asset inventory lists are currentliliCorrespond with outside clients about the deliveries of drives and Digital transfers AsperaliliSome administrative duties may be required like filing documents copying archiving and setting up deliveriesliliPhysical labor may be required with our physical assets in the vault up to 25 lbsliliOther duties as assignedliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliMust have 2  4 years of experience working in AV postproduction environmentliliWorking Knowledge of Xytech or Digital Asset Management SoftwareliliKnowledge of Word Excel Outlook and FileMaker ProliliExperience working with many different types of data and video filesliliAbility to multitask in a high pressure fastpaced postproduction environmentliliMust have a professional attitude and the ability to work cooperatively with coworkersliliStrong organization and communication skills with attention to detailliulpnbspppbrppWe offer competitive pay and a comprehensive benefits program including medical dental amp vision coverage vacation amp sick leave 401k and morep
